Mobile Application Development

Development Concerns

  • How fast can an application be built and in the app store
  • How fast can a second application on a different platform be completed
  • How to get the content updates out to the application
  • How can the current devlopment team build and maintain these applications

Take a look at some of the development concerns when building a native application

  • How fast can 'we' get an app in the app store? How fast can we get the next one in a different store?
  • Update content without going through the app submission process.
  • Update content without needing a developer
  • How do we maintain code for multiple applications on different platforms
  • Do we have the right developers to cover all the platforms
